dt: {bc}an adjunct to something larger or more important {bc}{sx|appurtenance||}
{bc}a usually projecting part of an animal or plant body that is typically smaller and of less functional importance than the main part to which it is attached
{bc}a limb or analogous part (such as a seta)

shortdef: an adjunct to something larger or more important : appurtenance

a usually projecting part of an animal or plant body that is typically smaller and of less functional importance than the main part to which it is attached; especially : a limb or analogous part (such as a seta)
